form_description: Fill out the details below. The more information you fill out the greater visibility your ad will receive.
property_category: Choose the right category for your ad
heading: Upload Property Photos
description: Upload at least 5 photos (maximum 25 photos) to attract car shoppers to your listing. Use landscape orientation (horizontal) for optimal photo display.
similar_image_name_error: Some images names are similar. Please ensure each image has a unique name
image_size_error: The maximum size of file should be 30 mb
failed_network_message: No internet available. Check your network connection
title: Title
minimum_square_meters_error: Square Meters should be between 1.00 and 99999.99
number_format_square_meters_error: Square Meters should only be number
reference_number_invalid_characters_erro: Reference Number should be AlphaNumeric, Hyphen (-)and Underscore ( _ ) only
show_exact_location: Show approximate location on the map
are_you_agent_message: Are you a real estate agent?
get_access_message: Purchase a subscription online for up to 50 listings
blue_plate_information_message: Using Blue Plate information gives an accurate location. Viewers are more likely to contact you if the locations is precise
suggestion_description: Photos are the most important component of a listing. Not only do listings with photos get better placement in the search results, they also generate more consumer interest and engagement.
suggestion_1: Try including a variety of angles
suggestion_2: Try including as many areas as you could
if_you_want_to: If you want to upload multiple listing, please
email_it_to_our_team: and email it to our team.
multiple_photograph_description: Enter details correctly on the XML template. Our team will add the property listings to your account within 72 hours. You will need to add photographs manually  before publishing.
success_msg_for_basic_user: Your ad has been created. There's just one more step needed to publish the ad.
hidden_price_message: Please insert hidden price. This price will not be displayed to other users
real_state_subscriptions_2: to renew or upgrade your subscription to post more ads & continue accessing your existing ads
reached_maximum_limit: You have reached the maximum limit of posting ads under your current subscription.
reached_maximum_limit_2: to upgrade your subscription to post more ads
insufficient_balance: You've reached the maximum limit for published ads. To publish a new ad, you'll need to un-published an existing one or contact support.
missing_user_id: User Id is missing in token
modal_initial_detail: Your ad has been successfully published. You can preview the ad from the dashboard.
modal_initial_more_info: For more visibility, do you want to refresh it now?
modal_success_detail: Your ad has been successfully refreshed. You can preview the ad from the dashboard.
modal_error_detail: Your ad has not been refreshed. Please check your available refresh balance, or purchase additional refreshes from the add-ons section.
unauthorized_access: Can not access this ad or this ad does not exists
update_contact_info_message: Before posting, please ensure your phone number and WhatsApp number are added. You can update them on the
